_header: When thine earen dinneth and thy nose sharpeth
_description: Signs of Death — eight long lines or 16 shorter ones

BLHar7322.First Lines: Wonne þin eren dinet and þin nose scharpetAnd þin hew dunnet and þi sennowess starket…
BLHar7322.Last Lines: …Al to late al to late þen is te wayn atte yateFor may vor no man þenne penaunce make
BLHar7322.Note: Added to lower margin of leaf; eight long lines with the last two written to right of the other six, crowded between the six lines and the gutter so not maintaining verse lines.
